amendment.description: Amendment allows unused family and employment-based visas to be allocated on an annual basis to the adult children, brothers, and sisters of U.S. citizens, provided they have applied for application for admission prior to March 13, 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 15 in House Report 104-483, to allow unused family and unemployment-based visas to be allocated on an annual basis to the adult children, brothers, and sisters of U.S. citizens, provided they have applied for application for admission into the country prior to March 13, 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
